And, I want to channel the opportunity to my"kababayans" or fellow Mindanao people where I can possibly be a good help to travel to Mindanao and speak the native dialect of the lumads or Visayan dialect to promote this particular project or opportunity that can enhance and develop a good community service and enterprenuership in Mindanao,Philippines. I am currently in the US but not working,except my husband. Due to my family's needs in the Philippines that I have difficulty providing them with their needs as or resources here is also limited, viewing on TFC regarding KIVA program makes me excited to give a try and perhaps, I can be part for any developmental program for Mindanao.

lenders.name: Andrew K
lenders.loan_because: Why not do something good with the money in my account that's just sitting around?
lenders.occupational_info: I help design software solutions to business problems

lenders.name: The Audacity of War
lenders.loan_because: we wish to find constructive ways to help others.

lenders.name: Sunstreak
lenders.loan_because: I know that I am lucky to have all the privileges that I do, and I feel that I should help those who aren't as lucky as I am.

lenders.name: Alex Akesson
lenders.loan_because: It's a worthy cause
lenders.occupational_info: Journalist

lenders.name: Karen S
lenders.loan_because: It is my way of helping to empower people with initiative who struggle with the resources to enable them to achieve their goals.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a small farmer who strives to grow food and raise farm animals in an ecologically friendly, natural and sustainable way.

lenders.name: suleman
lenders.loan_because: i want to start a barbering shop of my own...
lenders.occupational_info: it helps brings out the beauty of people...

lenders.name: anna
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lenders.occupational_info: i teach design at a large university in the US.

lenders.name: Simona
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the office in London. Spend my day speaking to many people on the phone because of the nature of my job which is sales and marketing.

lenders.name: kolo
lenders.loan_because: Hey baby! It's the no  deposit casinos feeling! Come feel!
lenders.occupational_info: gambling, no deposit casinos, free casino

lenders.name: Max Power
lenders.loan_because: My girlfriend works for Kiva in Nicaragua.  She has shown me how amazing it is to affect change on such a local level.
lenders.occupational_info: I have the privilege of working for the greatest museum in the world, the Smithsonian Institution in Washington, DC.

lenders.name: Obed
lenders.occupation: Teacher and and Ph D student

lenders.name: Tara
lenders.loan_because:
"...teach someone to fish, feed them for a lifetime.."   

I believe in people who believe in themselves. 

Giving them the help they need to start a business where they can support themselves is so much better than just providing them with food and shelter and making them dependent on someone else!

lenders.name: Pete
lenders.loan_because: I believe reducing poverty is central to achieving sustainability.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses become more conscious.

lenders.name: Roberto
lenders.loan_because: It rocks! :) :) :)

lenders.name: Chidi
lenders.loan_because: I was born in Sierra Leone west Africa and I've lived in both Zimbabwe and the Ivory Coast so I have witnessed real poverty in my life.  Today I am blessed with a good job and a loving family so giving back to people all across the world who could really use as little as $25 to change their lives makes me feel good about myself, and is a way of me correcting what I saw as a child but was too young to do anything about.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an Interactive Media Designer for a newspaper in Minneapolis Minnesota, USA

lenders.name: Julius M. Palsson
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I make a living of designing and configuring network equipment for subsea installations.

lenders.name: Nicole
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!

lenders.name: Phil
lenders.loan_because: No matter how I think about it, there's always a way to help others.

lenders.name: Vasiliy
lenders.loan_because: Necessary to buy the extras. This tool for improvement quality to my product.
lenders.occupational_info: I concern with the repair of the fuel equipment of the diesel engines, which are installed on car and tractor.

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because:
The Three Big Reasons:

1: I can save a life

2: I can encourage innovation against poverty

3: There is no such thing as someone too far away to be a fellow traveller in creation.

lenders.name: GittaJohanna
lenders.loan_because: I like it !

lenders.name: Charia
lenders.occupational_info: I am an at home baker whose dream is to open the first cupcake bakery in my city, Athens, Ga.  My goal is to create cupcakes that are truly unforgettable and bring a little sunshine to your day.  I have been given a talent and love for creating and I want to share my passion with those around me.

lenders.name: Josh
lenders.loan_because: It helps me to stay grounded and realize how fortunate I am, and that I can help others to become fortunate.

lenders.name: UK Internet Sites
lenders.loan_because: All it can take is a little help to see a business grow and we like that idea behind Kiva that gives people world wide access to a loan that they might otherwise not get.
lenders.occupational_info: We run a range of websites that provided useful services for business and consumers world wide.

lenders.name: Danielle
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to assist others when you can.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit company that assists disabled adults in living independently.

lenders.name: Leonico
lenders.loan_because: A small loan can make a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: Small online marketing company based in Scotland.

lenders.name: MARY ANNE & JULIUS
lenders.loan_because: My husband knows the conditions in the Philippines.  We feel like this is a little something that we can do to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in an ambulatory clinic with patients that have few resources.  My husband works for the Superior Court, in the criminal division.

lenders.name: Elena
lenders.loan_because: I feel that it is my responsibility as a human to give other families the chance to lead a healthy and peaceful life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a teacher of visual art as well as a mentor to students ages 12- 18 years of age in a public high school. I really love my job because I am given the small opportunity to influence the minds of the next generation of global citizens.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: it's fun to see how a small amount of money can do so much.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a budget analyst and manage the budget of a large government office.  I like my job a lot.  It can be challenging at times and I like that.  It's never boring.

lenders.name: Shay and Britta
lenders.loan_because: I can.  We want to follow Ralph Waldo Emerson's timeless counsel when he stated, "Dare to live the life you have dreamed for yourself. Go forward and make your dreams come true."

lenders.name: Frankie
lenders.loan_because: It allows me to share what I have been so richly given with those who need a helping hand.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a writer and share my thoughts insights and life experience with others.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: It helps people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I protect what is important to my clients.

lenders.name: Spartan Global 2
lenders.loan_because: We believe that our loans are a representation of the respect and opportunity that we extend to the highly capable and determined entrepreneurs that are working hard to improve the circumstances of their families and communities.
lenders.occupational_info: We are a group of Michigan State University students who share a passion for both spreading awareness of the success of the microcredit lending model as well as directly raising funds to lend to hard working entrepreneurs around the world!

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: it's a tangible way to spread Love across the globe.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: To provide opportunities for others.
lenders.occupational_info: Assist in fulfilling the wishes of children with life-threatening illnesses.

lenders.name: Christy
lenders.loan_because: It's a super simple way to make a difference in the lives of others.  Also, my one time contribution can turn into many loans if I want it to.

lenders.name: Dave & Carol
lenders.loan_because: a lot of people have great ideas and need just that one little break to make it happen.

lenders.name: Cheryl, Mckenzy & Rylee
lenders.loan_because: Karma! and because its important to me to teach my girls about helping others, its their money we're lending! (well, the tooth fairys anyway)
lenders.occupational_info: Im sort of like a case worker for a state subsidized health insurance plan. We determine whos eligible and ensure only eligible members remain on the program

lenders.name: de nada
lenders.occupational_info: "I prefer to be remembered for what I have done for others, not for what others have done for me." ~Thomas Jefferson~

lenders.name: Shelly
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference to those that need it most to survive.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a group of counselors who work with undergraduate and masters students to graduate and change their quality of life!! Our base is over 60% women, many of whom are single monthers.  You must continue learning to change your life.

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: myself and other atheists can care about the future of humanity in a clear-eyed fashion, without needing carrots, sticks, and churches.
lenders.occupational_info: I've worked as a software programmer and musician

lenders.name: Mercedes Marina
lenders.loan_because: I need money to finance my seam work  I make gloves for the use in pool with the local banks is difficult to obtain loans for that reason I resort to you
lenders.occupational_info: es muy bueno tener una actividad en la cual  se pueda trabajar dia a dia

lenders.name: Ross
lenders.loan_because: it's nice to have an impact all over the world, even if it is small.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm in the first year of a Ph.D. program in Economics, hoping to teach and do research.

lenders.name: IHO John W. Griffing
lenders.loan_because: my dad John W. Griffing, Sr. was always available to help others with his money, time, patience, kindness, and hard work.  I loan to carry on a small part of his philanthropy.

lenders.name: Alyssa
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm trying to make a nanoparticle vaccine for HIV!
